website_summaries.verdict: Stay cool and calm with headgear that keeps athletes focused on the game.
pros: Helps athletes feel more confident and performance-focused
Made of Cool Max fabric to evaporate moisture
cons: Could be more comfortable around the ears

customer_reviews.title: My girls have been wearing this product for years
customer_reviews.text: My girls have been wearing this product for years Both girls have been playing soccer since they were 4 years old . My youngest has also played Basketball for 7 years . I feel that wearing a guard has kept my Daughters from having a concussion. My eldest daughter is now entering her 3rd year of College as a goalkeeper,with no concussions . While most people will have their young athletic player wear one AFTER a concussion I felt it was important not to injure their young brains at all .
customer_reviews.author: patti h

customer_reviews.title: ... second concussion a few months back and it was recommended we get a head gear such as this to ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9yo son suffered his second concussion a few months back and it was recommended we get a head gear such as this to help minimize the chances of another concussion. He loves the fit, comfort, and style of it which helps tons with his confidence of getting back on the field. The fact it's not bulky helps him not be self conscious about wearing it either.
customer_reviews.author: Mlongoria

customer_reviews.title: Will not protect you from a concussion
customer_reviews.text: I got two concussions while wearing it. One was an elbow to the head and the other was head-to-head. Both times the other person made contact with the helmet. I no longer play soccer.
customer_reviews.author: David S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Order this for our daughter who is starting her second season of high school soccer. She asked for this band as she felt this band would sit more securely on her hand and not be bumped out of place. She was excited to have the ability to adjust it to her head. However, it was to difficult to adjust by herself and required adjustment everytime she took it on and off. I believe this product does protect the head. However, the easy of use is simply not there. We have returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Knitrgrl

customer_reviews.title: My girl is using it for ice skating
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year-old girl is learning ice skating. I'm always worried that one day she will hit her head or tail bone hard. I saw another ice skater using this soft helmet, so I decided to give it a try. I know this headgear is designed for soccer, but it works fine for ice skating as well. It protects the area that is likely to hit the ice when she falls. It stays on my girls head okay. The ponytail port helps to keep the headgear in place. The only complain I have is the quality of those hook & loop fastening tapes. Look like they won't last for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality band
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had 3 concussions and I was looking for a good quality band to protect her during basketball and volleyball. When I received this band the quality was not what I expected and it wouldn't sit properly on her head. I returned it and went to the local Scheels and got a better quality band. The good news is the company was really good about returning product and refunding my money.
customer_reviews.author: Lori LeBrun

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old daughter has worn one of these for several years now. Had to finally replace due to the velcro wearing out. If it wasn't for this headgear, she would no longer be playing soccer as by the age of 11 she had already had 2 concussions. This has saved her soccer career.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter doesn't really like it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my 16 yr old daughter does not like this headgear as much as the one she has worn for the past few years. Although this probably protects more b/c it doesn't have as many openings as her old one, she says it doesn't adjust easily and not as easy to wear a pony tail. Her other one was falling apart (the outer material, not the headgear itself) so that is why she wanted a new one. After wearing the new one a couple of times, she ended up just cutting off the loose material coming off the old one and wearing that one again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son had a couple serious concussions within a couple months of each other. We bought this and he's been using it for a year. He heads the ball in soccer and hasn't had any sort of a concussion since. I'd recommend for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: T. Reese

customer_reviews.title: This product gets two stars only because it was well ...
customer_reviews.text: This product gets two stars only because it was well manufactured. However, after a couple on concussions from soccer we bought this hoping my daughter could continue playing. No dice! The energy from heading the ball is transferred straight to the head. This is not an adequate safety device.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Tersptra

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my child's head. She has thick ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my child's head. She has thick hair and it won't fit around her hair. Made for kids with thin hair. I ordered the large one and sent it back for the reason stated above
customer_reviews.author: anita rosso

customer_reviews.title: Pros- from the stands looks like a head band
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my high school daughter that has had issues with concussions while playing basketball. It does the job. Cons- sometime she has a hard time keeping it on. It slides off and she has to mess with it to fit right again. It is cumbersome with all the Velcro straps in the back but I suppose how else would you design it. Pros- from the stands looks like a head band.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe comfortable head
customer_reviews.text: Hard to figure out how to make it fit your head but once you do it’s great. I can play soccer with more confidence and no discomfort. Slide tackles baby
customer_reviews.author: charlemagne

customer_reviews.title: Hail to the Header!
customer_reviews.text: Looked good, quality made. My daughter liked her old one to my dismay, so we sent this back. She plays college soccer and heads a ton. She didn't like the way her hair was to fit through the notch in the back. She didn't like the way it fit in the front. In my opinion, it would have secured it better, but she didn't care for it. Sorry folks.
customer_reviews.author: MJO

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product a little bulkier on the Head than the previous version my son had but protective, arrived on time and as described, seems well constructed
customer_reviews.author: A. Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Good head protection
customer_reviews.text: This was a great relief to my Step-daughter's Mom, so that she is protected as a Goalie and get a major concussion.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Size is accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 3 for my 11yr- fit perfect and 2 for my 8 yr - my 8 yr old has a tiny head- so it is a bit big on him. The size 1 was too tight. I got these because my 8year got a mild concussion- so now they wear them with pride. Protection is better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Smile

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: I have received 2 concussions in the past 2 years. One bring a 3rd degree and the other one being mild. I am in love with soccer and nothing can keep me from playing ,but at the beginning of this season the ball scared me because I revived one of mine from playing. This headband changed the way I played I wasn't scared anymore. I was back to playing as rough as I did before I suffered my concussions. I would like to thank full 90 for fixing the way I played with this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: My son wore out his original Full 90 after 7+ years of use, so it was time to purchase a new one. Knowing he has some extra protection out there on the soccer field is priceless, especially now that he’s older and playing high school level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and padded to safeguard your soccer player!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very well made headgear piece that we purchased for my daughter for soccer. We were impressed by how well it fit, but also how well it was able to be customized to the head of the player themselves. We were so happy when our daughter personally asked for this and are looking forward to her using it for seasons to come and knowing now that she is better safeguarded to head injury!
customer_reviews.author: Dad of Divas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This soccer head gear is a great product for protection. My son had a head knock that really threw him for a loop. With this product I feel he's safer than he ever was. He was very happy at the light weight....lighter than a ball cap! He always wears this gear while playing the game! He even thinks it helps him head the ball with further distance. If you or your child plays soccer, this is a must in protection!
customer_reviews.author: TracyS

customer_reviews.title: Initial Use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used it for the first time this weekend in a game. She did do a couple of headers with it on and said that she did notice a difference for the better. It does take some time to get use to and to get it fitted correctly. However, the safety and security that it provides is well worth it. Two team members have had concussions this season. The coach and all the players agreed that they will wear this headgear for the remainder of season and evaluate it's effectiveness at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred E. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 10 yr old keeper
customer_reviews.text: The full 90 provides great protection and is comfortable to wear. My daughter knows the full 90 goes on whenever the gloves go on and it isn't a battle as it was with another headband.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Great headgear ! My daughter sustained a concussion in her first volleyball game of the year.... could not play without some sort of head protection... we even had to get a letter from the state athletic association for her to wear the gear in state playoffs... as can be expected, rival teams and fans made fun and jeered the full helmet.... the Full 90 Performance gear now allows her to play with protection, yet be not restricting and the important quality of being stylish.... Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nietz

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has worn this for four years. While ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has worn this for four years. While it protects the front and side of the head, she took a blow to the back of the head recently from a soccer ball and got a concussion. I never noticed the protection does not go fully around the head circumference. I am looking into other models now at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Safety option
customer_reviews.text: We purchased three of these for players on our high school soccer team, one of which had a prior concussion. I am satisfied with the product. It stays on during the games but is easy to remove during half. The players have adjusted well to the product without much complaint. I feel a lot better having him on the field with this on! One of our players is very cautious and feels safer wearing protection.
customer_reviews.author: rob from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Good headgear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old son playing Select soccer. It is adjustable and he likes it a lot. I tried it on his 12 year old sister and she couldn't comfortably get her pony tail through the hole in back (she has long and thick hair). We bought her a different brand. This is a well priced product and we would not be on the soccer field without it.
customer_reviews.author: kemshopper

customer_reviews.title: Not proven to stop concussions
customer_reviews.text: Concussions occur with the brain rattling inside the cranium. This products diminishes some of the force of impact, but probably does little for a major impact. That being said, I prefer to go after a header against an opponent with whatever modest protection it affords. My brain is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cinco de Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We havent been able to use yet. My daughter is 11 years old and this fit her great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Druen

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Great impact dampening. Segmented pads allow flexibility. Hair pass through works. Could use more elastic for better fit.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this several times for my boys. Its the best money you will spend on a sport item. it has saved them a few times. Soccer can be a rough sport with many head cocussions due to falls.
customer_reviews.author: LISSETTE MCCALLUM

customer_reviews.title: my daughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: She got a concussion (not from soccer) at start of season this fall. After taking the time off and being medically cleared to play, we decided this would be a good idea. She likes it and it has lowered her fear of playing again. It gets hot and sweaty, but there is no way around that (something with padding going around your head as you run). Very light weight, but I feel it will help on hit to the head
customer_reviews.author: Indygreg

customer_reviews.title: Strange fit
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews said, this item fits weird and the ear cutout use in a weird spot. I wear it with my ears tucked inside.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good head protection. Some difficulty keeping it in place without continual adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: C Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great Headband
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. This is the second headband my daughter uses. She wears it during scrimmages and all games. It fits good and stays on while she plays. Love this headband!
customer_reviews.author: S G

customer_reviews.title: Figure skating
customer_reviews.text: Works well, in my daughter figure skating club it's mandatory to wear this type of head gear when practicing. At the beginners level all ones must wear helmets, then as a next step, when they have passed some set of qualification tests, they use this lighter head gear. This gear allows them to move unhindered to perform all moves on the ice, while giving them a good head protection. It also allows them to have some hairstyle. I think it's great that they wear this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: My son does not even realize he is wearing it. If it provides any protection it is worth it. The only down side is playing in cold weather it is hard to get a hat over it. My son has worn this product for over a year. During that time I have seen him take several hard blows that kind of put my heart in my throat but my son just kept going. Again as mentioned by others I believe it drastically reduces the force of the blow. I have nothing negative to say about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Fly

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for protection for your soccer player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter after she suffered a concussion and it has helped her feel confident while playing. While wearing this she has hit heads with other girls and this has saved her from getting another injury. I am definitely buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Soccer mom
customer_reviews.text: No more head injuries My daughter is 15 and uses her head when playing. She had concussion that took her off soccer for 12 weeks. I bought her this and she loves it. She does her header with no problem. Its light on her head.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: thank you
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my son safe Other parents asked about it and will be purchasing
customer_reviews.author: lorena

customer_reviews.title: Has helped avoid issues during multiple hard clashes
customer_reviews.text: Item works better than other more expensive and cheaper models. Our whole team has now upgraded to this head gear. Slammers FC
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Great headgear
customer_reviews.text: Some kids on my son's flag football team have started wearing these during practice. Great for the accidental bumps and collisions. Just a little extra head protection for active boys. Unfortunate the league won't let them wear them during games, but at least they have some protection during practice. Very comfortable. My 7 yr old never complains about wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: J...B

customer_reviews.title: Too big and short return time
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the return time on this item. It is only 30 days. I didn't know that, I purchased in time for the season to start but he hasn't had a chance to wear it yet and I cant return it. Do not buy unless you are aware of this. I'm upset!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Traina

customer_reviews.title: Should be required!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was "worried" about how it would look, but she is very cool with it now. We have a couple girls on the team wearing them and they are making them "cool". Very solid, with longer hair and a pony she has no issues with it "shifting around". I'm not sure how it would fair with shorter hair as her pony "holds it in place". good buy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wise choice
customer_reviews.text: Got this as more if a precautionary thing after hearing about so many concussions during games. My daughter has only used it in practice and is still getting used to it. Pony tail hole is a plus. She can do headers just fine. She said it slips a bit when she runs hard. Comfy and breathable material. She will wear it in games next season.
customer_reviews.author: A mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase with a peace of mind to help prevent concussion. Although size I should have got extra large. If you go medium then consider a large, large consider extra large. My son is 16 years old went for large and extra large would have been better. Still fits just but still excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: my son says it is very comfortable, not in the way at all, and looks cool too! Recently my 12 yr old son wanted to play in a soccer tournament with about 8 staples in his head, so of course I went out looking for some type of protection for him. Thank goodness because i found this item. I only wish I had known about it before because perhaps he could have avoided a major concussion last year if he was wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: mindyphouse

customer_reviews.title: he wasn't comfortable playing in it
customer_reviews.text: Was too bulky for my son, he wasn't comfortable playing in it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Merten

customer_reviews.title: Comfort  and safty
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and helps with the unpacl of the head collisions
customer_reviews.author: monique  ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when my 11 year old son said he wanted headgear for soccer. He is a very aggressive player and this gives me a little piece of mind knowing that everytime he heads the ball there is some protection. My son said it is comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Wearing this to play intercollegiate basketball after sitting out a year with a traumatic brain injury. It offers good protection from bumps, stays on and is washable.
customer_reviews.author: DebsD

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to do minor alterations to it because the back velcro was irritating due to sitting to low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: necessary for all soccer players
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for each of my girls. It became useful during the first day when my younger girl fell down and another girl hit her head. Competitive soccer is a physical game and kids need protection. I want to give my girls whatever protection I can. BTW, it works well to keep their hair out of their eyes also.
customer_reviews.author: Gursel Taskale

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 concussions, my daughter was ordered by a doctor to wear this to play soccer. It did its job of protecting her head, however made her a target by opposing teams. If you or your child must still play this is the way to go, but be forewarned EVERYONE knows you have had a concussion.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J. Siecke

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and provides protection from light to medium bumps
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for men's soccer after an injury. It works well, comfortable, and provides protection from light to medium bumps. A little hard to head the ball with. Overall worth it if you want protection from arms/heads when going for the ball.
customer_reviews.author: LucaBrasi

customer_reviews.title: Find a better choice
customer_reviews.text: This is for my daughter who plays high school soccer. It is uncomfortable. I doubt that it offers much protection. it is quite hard.
customer_reviews.author: theobone

customer_reviews.title: A must for all soccer players at any age
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this after our 11 year old daughter was injured on a play. She wears it for basketball and soccer. It takes a little getting use to, but once you get past that she doesn't notice (or bother with) it anymore. Protect your child with this very light weight product. Randy
customer_reviews.author: Randy S. Milliron

customer_reviews.title: It's Great
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old son plays soccer and took a pretty hard hit to the ground before he got the Full90. This fits his head great. It is fully adjustable to fit kids with multiple head sizes. He has received a lot of compliments from his coach and team mates about how "cool" it looks. It is very light and doesn't bother him while he is playing, and he is the type that usually fidgets with everything thing, but not the Full90, he barely notices it. It is not meant to protect like a football helmet, but I think it will do a good job reducing major impacts with other players, the ground, knees etc.
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: More socially appropriate
customer_reviews.text: More socially appropriate tham the helmet for children with autism.
customer_reviews.author: star

customer_reviews.title: OK product
customer_reviews.text: Good merchandise. Not enough proof that it can actually prevent a concussion. Just bought it just as a preventive. My daughter didn't like wearing it as it rides her hair up (like those hair bump-it commercials).
customer_reviews.author: Y. Velazco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Soccer head gear
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and does the job for the soccer gal that is giving headers at the game.
customer_reviews.author: RoMa

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, unfortunately sizes doesn't match and it is very expensive
customer_reviews.author: In Wo

customer_reviews.title: It fits great - FULLY adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headgear for my 9 year old son. It fits great - FULLY adjustable. Much better than the nonadjustable ones his soccer league offered for purchase. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ash

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan of protective head gear in youth sports. ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of protective head gear in youth sports. Injuries can and will still happen, but anything you can do to mitigate some risk is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: scott lee

customer_reviews.title: Head Protection so far...
customer_reviews.text: After 3 concussions we don't leave home without it. Fits great, protects and he hasn't had a concussion since he has been wearing this. Hopefully he won't get more and his little brain can heal. All from soccer. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: C.L Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I measured my daughter's head and it measured for a size large. We had another one of these from the same manufacturer, but it was a different style in the sm/med that was way to small on her. In this style the large runs bigger than what is stated for measurements, so if you measure at the smaller end of a large, I would order the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gato

customer_reviews.title: Full 90--Good thing to have for head protection!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter suffered a concussion playing basketball and plays soccer as the goal keeper. She is a teenager and doesn't mind wearing it at all. At first she thought it would "weird", but she soon found out that it actually looks pretty good, and now some of her team mates are wearing one.
customer_reviews.author: CandyCane

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably while playing
customer_reviews.text: This product is light and fits pretty good , small to medium size runs a bit small , I have tried it in four different games as an Adult player and like it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudi

customer_reviews.title: Great for a goalkeeper
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter, who had been kicked in the head twice playing keeper. Once I got her talked into wearing it (bribes, threats, extortion ...) it's become habit. I gave it 4 stars not five only because it's not fashion-forward in the eyes of my daughter. I wish her league would require them for goalkeepers and then we wouldn't have had such a battle.
customer_reviews.author: Whale62

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked until he thought he looked dorky, then it didn't work any more. ;{
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Fearson

customer_reviews.title: Its a good idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who plays soccer. She wore it once and didn't want to wear it again. It was too sweaty and hard to get it to stay in place. It's a good idea but it didn't work out for her.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Will slide off longer hair.
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine, I have longer hair and just trying it on I could tell it would slide off the minute I started playing. I made adjustments the best I could but it was a no-go. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Duenas

customer_reviews.title: ... suffered from a concussion for 7 months it was pretty serious. He was finally released to get back ...
customer_reviews.text: My son suffered from a concussion for 7 months it was pretty serious. He was finally released to get back into sports and this is the only way I will let him play . A little extra protection
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A.

customer_reviews.title: Now required after a concussion at my kids soccer club ...
customer_reviews.text: Now required after a concussion at my kids soccer club, it works really well and my teen daughter does not mind wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: RA5050

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a concussion earlier this year and was looking for some protection when she goes in for challenges. This headgear fit the bill and has become a staple in her backpack. Great protection and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter stated that it slips up on her head easily even with it tightened well. Not enough to come off, but just enough to be annoying during games. The hole for pony tail is great! Doesn't get in way of head balls. Recommend for all soccer players.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Using with my young son whom plays keeper at U-11. I like the fit he feels good wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Family first

customer_reviews.title: Great confidence builder and looks good
customer_reviews.text: This headgear has improved my son's game immensely. He scored several goals this fall on his U17 team with his head when before he avoided header situations. Great confidence builder and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Not easy for my daughter to get both pieces together with ...
customer_reviews.text: Not easy for my daughter to get both pieces together with out help and we couldn't get her fat ponytail through the hole
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: It is light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: using on mom elderly mom who is a fall risk when she is left alone in the house for any amount of time. She doesn't mind it. It is light and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Soccer headgear
customer_reviews.text: It is very lightweight, so my daughter wears it and it's not cumbersome. It seems though that no matter how many times she adjusts the Velcro on the sides, it still doesn't stay in place very well. I see her tugging at it during her games. Also, she has sports glasses and they don't fit on her face with the headgear on, so she has to wear contacts.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D. Gillingham

customer_reviews.title: It's a little scratchy in some areas otherwise it fits great.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I ordered and needed. It's a little scratchy in some areas otherwise it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: llspps

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We use at home for our daughter who has fainting issues. Gives me some peace of mind and her a little freedom. Doesn't make her too hot. Fabric is not easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Miller

customer_reviews.title: It just makes sense.
customer_reviews.text: If your child plays competitive soccer it's only a question of when he or she will get a bump to the head, and fortunately for my daughter she had the headgear on when she took a shot to the left temple area at point blank range. The way I see it if you have your kids put on headgear when they ride their bikes, why wouldn't you have them put on headgear when playing soccer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Protect your head!
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of kids getting concussions in our league, I got this for my son. He doesn't complain about wearing it and it fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: son hate it until he gets kicked or runs into the goal post, then loves it
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Terry

customer_reviews.title: Head tramua peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and it gives me peace of mind. Now a few more kids on his team have purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Sim

customer_reviews.title: Good protection.Great for heading the ball. Highly recommend this brace for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my petite daughter. Good protection. Perfect fit for my petite daughter. Good protection.Great for heading the ball. Highly recommend this brace for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: SV Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Not for VB players.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for a volleyball player, it didn't work for what she needed. It would slip and slide too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the adjustable aspect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for figure skating, not soccer. I like the adjustable aspect, and it gives me more confidence to know I have some protection should I smack my head one day. It looks very sporty and is made with good quality material and workmanship. I've had many compliments on it from other athletes.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Van Patten

customer_reviews.title: Zero value describes this product.
customer_reviews.text: Useless comes to mind, also. Sizing entirely WRONG. Large will fit a medium head. Back of head padding a joke. Front padding also poor angle.. Looking good, except do not play soccer in it. Should get zero stars. A joke on the buyer.I will add rear padding, and give it away to someone with a small head. It must be rebuilt, to make it work at all. Out of the very stylish box, it is useless.Buy anything else, not this.A sock stuffed with foam, tied to head with bungee, would work better. Just AWFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Junk_Product_NO-MORE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, although it holds in a lot of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jo.b

customer_reviews.title: great fit. comfortable.  added  safety
customer_reviews.text: My son has had one concussion already. Playing indoor soccer can be dangerous. As an eigth grader playing with bigger kids especially i needed to know i was doing everything i could do as a mom to help protect him. He doesnt complain at all. A couple kids on th team wear it as well so ots not a big deal. Maybe every team or school should consider making this headgear mandatory. Its comfortable and well made. Great choice for my son
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: My high school daughter asked for this headgear after getting many headaches during and after practices and games from heading the ball. She is happy with the results and it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: S Bond

customer_reviews.title: not the best fit
customer_reviews.text: my kids said it was uncomfortable because is slides around too much.
customer_reviews.author: tonybrah 34

customer_reviews.title: It’s adjustable
customer_reviews.text: It’s an awesome product!!! Only thing is if could have a little more of an arch over the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy C.

customer_reviews.title: Full90 Performance Soccer Headgear Review
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the additional coverage provided compared to her older model. We appreciate the quality of materials used ion this version.
customer_reviews.author: ktnpenguin

customer_reviews.title: My daughter wears this while playing basketball to avoid getting ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears this while playing basketball to avoid getting a second concussion. The coach has requested the rest of the girl high school basketball team to buy one to at least wear in practice..
customer_reviews.author: Frank F.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product. High quality headgear. Perfect fit. All soccer players should be required to wear head gear & if all were like this - they might. Protect your child's head in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: queentash

customer_reviews.title: Should be mandatory!
customer_reviews.text: Son wears this headgear every practice and game now. For the price it should be standard issue gear and he is much more confident on the field with it. Stays on and is not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. H.

product_meta.title: Full 90 Sports Premier Performance Soccer Headgear
product_meta.description: The X-Band design of the Premier has a low profile and a high level of protection and comfort. The adjustable lightweight cross-strap construction in addition to the interchangeable occipital padding makes the Premier the most unique and advanced headgear in the game. The inner lining of the Premier is constructed with moisture management fabric to accelerate moisture evaporation, allowing the player to keep his head in the game. It is based upon feedback from professional players and use under real game conditions, and therefore, is ideal for those athletes who play full out at the highest levels of the game.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED HEAD PROTECTION: The F90 Premier Performance Headgear represents the latest advancements in performance protection technology and Tru-Play design.

INTERCHANGEABLE PADDING: The Premier features an advanced tru-fit system, which is comprised of the new x-band design and new interchangeable occipital back padding. This gives players the amount of protection that's right for their style of play.
LIGHTWEIGHT/LOW PROFILE: Advanced Truefit System that provides expanded coverage of the occipital lobe while maintaining a low profile, custom and comfortable fit.
COOL MAX FABRIC: The Premier is constructed with Forcebloc foam and an inner lining of Cool Max fabric to accelerate moisture evaporation, allowing the player to keep their head in the game.
SIZING: Measure completely around your forehead at the fullest part pulling the tape measure snug. Small / Medium: 19 to 22 inches (49-56 cm), Large: 21 7/8 to 24 inches (55-62 cm)
